Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(api): fix DI container initialization order and old config imports

This commit resolves runtime dependency injection errors caused by:
1. Routes being imported before DI container setup
2. Old middleware files referencing deprecated config paths

Changes:
- Move setupContainer() call before route imports in app.ts
- Update errorHandler.ts to use new shared/config/env path
- Update logger.ts to use new shared/config/env path
- Add logLevel to EnvConfig interface and implementation
- Update .env.example with LOG_LEVEL variable
- Remove old config files (config/env.ts, config/cors.ts)

This fixes the "Attempted to resolve unregistered dependency token" error
and ensures proper DI container initialization before route registration.

Tested: Server starts successfully and health endpoint responds correctly.
